headline: Wright Flood completes the acquisition of Poulton Associates, LLC
summary: CLEARWATER, Fla., Nov. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Wright National Flood Insurance Company (“Wright Flood”) today announced the completion of the previously announced acquisition of the insurance operations Poulton Associates, LLC. About Wright National Flood Insurance CompanyWright Flood, a wholly owned subsidiary of Brown & Brown Inc., operating within Arrowhead Programs, is the largest flood insurance provider in the nation, offering federal, excess and private flood insurance with leading i
